rev.desc.rev.desc: Appended the code with processing that checks for orphaned oncall records.

Added process panel finish.process.oncall it iterates through the schedule array, and removes elements of the schedule array that are not at least partially within the days schedule plus or minus one hour. This panel's normal exit goes to check.add.update.
Changed the two panels (decide.reset.tz, reset.tz.before.save.go) that used to exit to check.add.update to exit to finish.process.oncall.
Added processing to support exception time zones (built around same logic used for daily time zones).

descript.descript: Appended the code with processing that checks for orphaned oncall records.

Added process panel finish.process.oncall it iterates through the schedule array, and removes elements of the schedule array that are not at least partially within the days schedule plus or minus one hour. This panel's normal exit goes to check.add.update.
Changed the two panels (decide.reset.tz, reset.tz.before.save.go) that used to exit to check.add.update to exit to finish.process.oncall.
Added processing to support exception time zones (built around same logic used for daily time zones).
